rules_text:
When Unlimited Blade Works enters search your library for any number of Equipment cards and exile them, shuffle.
Skip your draw step.
You may cast a copy of cards exiled with this card by paying mana of any color equal to its mana value.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Unlimited Blade Works unless you pay {R}{W}.
When Unlimited Blade Works leaves shuffle all cards exiled with it into your library.
